name: spo-create-bulk-libraries
title: Bulk library generation
shortDescription: With this sample, you can create a whole bunch of libraries at once.
longDescription: With this sample, you can create a whole bunch of libraries at once. These are fairly simple libraries with an extra view and a few extra columns.

thumbnails.alt: Preview of the sample bulk library generation
